body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Come up with NoSQL side interface, similar to https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/tree/master/common/persistence/sql/sqlplugin

title: NoSQL persistence refactoring - Interfaces & implementation
